00017 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
00018 import os
00019 import tkinter
00020 
00021 ## settings() class
00022 #  
00023 #  The instance of this class generates the settings object required by several
00024 #  other objects. It inherits from dict primitive
00025 class settings(dict): 
00026     """Just a container for most settings shared between several objects.
00027        Settings that are automatically defined:
00028        - basedir
00029        - current working directory (cwd) - initially usr/worked - but can be overriden
00030        by settings from the loaded model (project.xml)
00031     
00032        Settings that are loaded from XML files:
00033        - menu widget ??? - put the path to resources in the XML file menu.xml ???
00034        - upper toolbox widget ??? - same as for the menu widget ???
00035        - canvas widget
00036        - XML Editor
00037        - console
00038        - status bar???"""
00039     ## The constructor
00040     # 
00041     #  Takes the 
00042     #  @param master
00043     #  argument which is the instance of the Application() class
00044     def __init__(self, master):
00045         """TODO:: define actions ..."""
00046         dict.__init__(self)
00047                 
00048                 ## @var self["basedir"]
00049                 #  Determines the base directory (Tkad.py directory)
00050                 #
00051                 #  Its value assumes that the main script starts from the Tkad.py directory
00052         self["basedir"] = os.getcwd() 
00053         
00054                 ## @var self["cwd"]
00055                 #  Determines the current working directory
00056                 #
00057                 #  Reads etc/paths.xml LastWorkingDir element. If a project is opened, this 
00058                 #  setting is overwritten by the project setting
00059         self["cwd"] = tkinter.StringVar()
00060         self["cwd"].set("")
00061 
00062         # ----------------------------- widgets settings ----------------------------- 
00063 
00064         # Menu
00065         self["menuIconsPath"] = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "resources/icons16x16/menu") # add possibilities for multiple resolutions        
00066         self["menuXMLPath"]   = os.path.join(self["basedir"], "etc/gui/menus.xml") 
00067         self["menu"]          = {"icons":{}}
00068         
00069         # Upper toolbox ???
00070         self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"] = "resources/icons22x22/uptoolbox"
00071         self["upperToolBoxXMLPath"]   = "etc/gui/uppertoolbox.xml"
00072         self["upperToolBox"]          = {"icons":{}} # ????
00073         
00074         # Canvas
00075         self["canvasXMLPath"] = os.path.join("etc/gui/canvas.xml")
00076         self["canvas"]        = {}
00077         # ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078         
00079         # other useful paths
00080         self["extraModulesPath"] = {}     # relative/absolute paths???
00081         self["XMLPath"] = "etc/paths.xml" # canvas.xml and others ???
00082 
00083         self.appTitle=tkinter.StringVar()
00084         self.appTitle.set("")
00085         
00086         self.master.title(self.appTitle.get())
00087 
00088         self.__parseXMLData()
00089 
00090     def __parseXMLData(self): # canvas.xml and others ???
00091         """Parses the default paths.xml file into the self["extraModulesPath"]"""
00092 
00093         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00094         root = tree.getroot()
00095         
00096         # modules:
00097         
00098         for i in root.getiterator('module'):
00099             self["extraModulesPath"][i[0].text] = i[1].text
00100             
00101         # lwd:
00102         
00103     def addXMLData(self, data, element):
00104         """Adds data to XML file paths.xml"""
00105         
00106         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00107         root = tree.getroot() 
00108 
00109         if (root.find(data).tag == data):
00110 
00111             if data == 'modules':
00112                 self["extraModulesPath"][element['name']] = element['path']
00113                 module = tree.SubElement(root.find(data), 'module')
00114                 name   = tree.SubElement(module, 'name')
00115                 name.text = element['name']
00116                 path   = tree.SubElement(module, 'path')
00117                 path.text = element['path']
00118             
00119             if data == "cwd":
00120                 self['cwd'] = element
00121                 lwd = root.find(data)
00122                 lwd.text = element
00123          
00124             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00125          
00126     def removeXMLData(self, data, element):
00127         """Removes data to XML file paths.xml"""
00128         
00129         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00130         root = tree.getroot() 
00131 
00132         if (root.find(data).tag == data) and (element in self["extraModulesPath"]):
00133             if data == 'modules':
00134                 del self["extraModulesPath"][element]
00135                 module = root.find('modules')
00136                 for i in module.findall('module'):   
00137                     if i[0].text == element:
00138                         module.remove(i)
00139             
00140             if data == "cwd": # resets to default /usr/worked
00141                 self['cwd'] = 'usr/worked'
00142                 lwd = root.find(data)
00143                 lwd.text = 'usr/worked'
00144                 
00145             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")
00146         
00147     def __call__(self, data): # must define
00148         """Call the settings instance with the project.xml settings in order to 
00149         override some of its attributes with the information found in it."""
00150         if data == "menu":
00151             return (self["menuXMLPath"], self["menuIconsPath"])
00152         if data == "uppertoolbox":
00153             return (self["upperToolBoxXMLPath"], self["upperToolBoxIconsPath"])
